description: We have worked with companies from various sectors, creating digital solutions that drive their growth. These are some of our featured projects.
connect_companies: We connect companies with innovative technological solutions to drive their global success.
transform_ideas: We transform your ideas into innovative and agile software, using the latest technologies to create lasting solutions that evolve with your business.
take_business_next_level: It's time to take your business to the next level. Dark Matter helps companies of all sizes transform their operations and connect the digital world with the physical through advanced technology.
pickup_corto: Vehicle management and maintenance platform with tracking of the detailing, repair, and delivery process, plus administration for sales and rentals.
pickup_largo:
Pickup Workshop is an advanced system that provides complete detailing and vehicle maintenance management services. It enables real-time tracking of the pickup, repair, and delivery process, ensuring efficient control at every stage. It includes detailed reports with specifications of each service performed, offering transparency and traceability.
Additionally, the system is part of a vehicle administration network for sales and rentals, where automobiles are assigned and moved in an organized manner to predefined delivery points. This optimizes logistics management and ensures that each unit reaches its designated destination efficiently.
pickup_sub: Comprehensive Platform for Vehicle Maintenance and Management
jade_corto: Accounts receivable management platform with real-time sales monitoring and mobile apps for vendors and supervisors.
jade_largo: Grupo Jade Rosario SRL is a comprehensive system for managing accounts receivable from vendors and clients. It includes full supervisor control, real-time tracking of vendors, locations, returns, quotations, and invoices. It also features advanced statistics, due date alerts, and low inventory notifications. Everything is connected to a sales application that allows vendors to manage clients, inventory, routes, goals, and document printing. Additionally, there is a supervisor application that enables real-time monitoring and administration of all relevant information.
jade_sub: Comprehensive Business and Sales Management System
luna_corto: Wholesale sales platform with private eCommerce, order management, automated invoicing, and profile control.
luna_largo: Rodr√≠guez Luna Import is a sales system designed for wholesale clients and vendors, offering a private eCommerce specialized in wholesale sales of parts and spare parts. It is part of a comprehensive administration system that enables efficient order counting, invoicing with automatic notifications, and real-time updates. The system supports various file types, advanced authentication, and multiple filters to facilitate product searches. It also includes subprocesses and detailed profile control for administrators, vendors, clients, and suppliers.
luna_sub: Private eCommerce for Wholesale Sales of Parts and Spare Parts
must_accept_privacy_policy: You must accept the privacy policy
slide_innovation_description: At Dark Matter Code, innovation is our main driver. We are dedicated to creating advanced technological solutions that transform businesses. From artificial intelligence to automation, we apply cutting-edge technology to ensure your company is always one step ahead.
slide_software_description: We design and develop custom software, adapting to the needs of each client. Our team creates efficient, secure, and scalable web and mobile applications, optimizing processes to maximize productivity.
slide_consulting_description: We provide strategic technology consulting for companies looking to optimize their systems and processes. From data analysis to cloud migrations, we guide you through digital transformation.
slide_integration_description: We develop comprehensive solutions that combine hardware and software to improve operational efficiency. From IoT to industrial automation, we connect smart devices with digital platforms.
slide_cybersecurity_description: We protect your information with advanced cybersecurity solutions. We implement encryption, firewalls, and real-time monitoring to ensure the integrity of your data and prevent digital threats.
slide_ai_description: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing the industry, and at Dark Matter Code we use it to optimize processes, reduce costs, and improve decision-making through predictive models and advanced automation.
slide_experience_description: Discover how our technological solutions have helped companies innovate and grow. See some of our projects in action and learn how we work.
